TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: The assembly to convert.
The file name of the resulting type library.
A value indicating any special settings.

Docs.summary: Converts an assembly to a COM type library.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (object typeLib, string asmFileName, int flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, byte[] publicKey, System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(object typeLib, string asmFileName, int32 flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, unsigned int8[] publicKey, class System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that implements the interface.
The file name of the resulting assembly.
A value indicating any special settings.
interface implemented by the caller.
A array containing the public key.
A object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.
If , the interfaces require link time checks for permission. If , the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.
Docs.summary: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.
Docs.returns: An object containing the converted type library.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags?displayProperty=fullName>. Otherwise, at least one of these parameters must be specified. If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature.
For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

Docs.exception:
is an empty string.
-or-
is longer than MAX_PATH.
The metadata produced has errors preventing any types from loading.
Docs.permission:
for permission to call unmanaged code.

Docs.summary: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.
Docs.returns: An object containing the converted type library.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags?displayProperty=fullName>. Otherwise, atleast one of these parameters must be specified. If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature.
For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, out string asmName, out string asmCodeBase);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(valuetype System.Guid g, int32 major, int32 minor, int32 lcid, string asmName, string asmCodeBase) cil managed

Docs.param: The GUID of the type library.
The major version number of the type library.
The minor version number of the type library.
The LCID of the type library.
On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.
On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.
Docs.summary: Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.
Docs.returns: if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise .
